evidence.claim: Connections NW uses AWS for cloud infrastructure services.
The company is compliant with HIPAA regulations for healthcare data management.
Their systems support integration patterns that include HL7 and X12 standards for health information exchange.
Utilization of FHIR standards is part of their health data interoperability strategy.
They implement cloud-native solutions on GCP for data processing and analytics.

icp.icp_reason: No direct evidence of X12 transaction processing or API automation use cases found.
